---
Help: Ensure Extra KM will get split across indents in same invoice and also verify return,resubmit invoice with new kms split across indents
Suites: oel3
Test
---
!5 Note: 
!5 For dedicated truck, the base freight is taken from minimum guarantee value given in dedicated truck master
!5 Extra KM charge is mentioned in dedicated master
!5 Calculation is based on extra km given by transporter while raising invoice
!5 Calculation -> extra km travelled * extra km charge per km => 453*10 = 4530
!5 Combined invoice -- > each indent has 4530/3 = 1510
!5 Return invoice and resubmit with different extra km-->900
!5 Verify 900*10=9000/3=3000 for each indent

!**> Unique values assignment
!|Script |Common                                     |
|$unique=|getCurrentDateTimeStamp;|yMMddHHmmss       |
|$num=   |getRandomNumber;        |100000 |999999    |
|$num1=  |getRandomNumber;        |20     |76        |
|$num2=  |getRandomNumber;        |1000   |9999      |
|$rand1= |getRandomString;        |2      |ALPHAUPPER|
|$year=  |getSubString;           |$unique|0    |4   |
|$indate=|getCurrentDateTimeStamp;|yyyy/MM/dd        |
|$vno_1= |getRandomNumber;        |20     |76        |
|$vno_2= |getRandomString;        |2      |ALPHAUPPER|
|$vno_3= |getRandomNumber;        |1000   |9999      |
|$perct1=|getRandomNumber;        |5      |30        |

!|Script       |DateUtil                                         |
|$truckindate= |dateCalculation;|yyyy/MM/dd                  |-7 |
|$truckoutdate=|dateCalculation;|yyyy/MM/dd                  |-5 |
|$rdate=       |dateCalculation;|yyyy/MM/dd                  |0  |
|$loadingDate1=|dateCalculation;|yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX|-10|
|$loadingDate2=|dateCalculation;|yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX|-9 |

!|Script       |Common                                         |
|$truckindate= |stringConcatenation;|$truckindate |!- $timer -!|
|$truckoutdate=|stringConcatenation;|$truckoutdate|!- $timer -!|
|$rdate=       |stringConcatenation;|$rdate       |!- $timer -!|

!|Script       |DateUtil                    |
|$truckindate= |utcConversion;|$truckindate |
|$truckoutdate=|utcConversion;|$truckoutdate|
|$rdate=       |utcConversion;|$rdate       |

!|Script        |DateUtil                                     |
|$expected_date=|dateCalculation;|yyyy/MM/dd        |0        |
|$expected_date=|utcConversion;  |$expected_date !- 10:00:00-!|
